title: Average Monthly Wholesale Price of Hogs for Slaughter for Berlin, Germany
notes:
Series Is Presented Here As Three Variables--(1)-- Original Data, 1879-1887 (2)--Original Data, 1887-1915 (3)--Original Data, 1911-1915, 1921-1922, 1924-1936. Prices Are For Common Hogs, Slaughter Weight. Live Weights Are Not Given For 1879-1887 Data. Source: Statistisches Jahrbuch Der Stadt Berlin, 1879, P.127 And Following Years For 1879-1887.

This NBER data series m04118a appears on the NBER website in Chapter 4 at http://www.nber.org/databases/macrohistory/contents/chapter04.html.

NBER Indicator: m04118a
